purpose: The email is a call for papers for the MLOps25 workshop focused on Machine Learning Operations, inviting submissions to address various challenges and advancements in the field.
evidence_sentences: This workshop encourages discussions on bridging the gap between data science experimentation and the reliable operation of ML components in production.
We invite submissions that address the open challenges, latest breakthroughs, and practical use cases in the rapidly evolving field of MLOps.
Submissions are encouraged on, but not limited to, the following topics:
Accepted papers will be published in the CEUR Workshop Proceedings (CEUR-WS.org).

Additionally, authors of accepted papers will be invited to submit an extended version of their work for consideration in the 'Special Issue on MLOps Advancements: Improving Development, Management, and Interpretability in AI and Machine Learning' in the journal Future Generation Computer Systems (FGCS).
